attributes.action: Make people who needlessly drive in the middle or outside lane as responsible as people who undertake
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst it is appreciated that in the UK, undetaking can be dangerous; it is most often caused by people occupying the middle and outside lanes, when there is no traffic on their inside and thus artificially causing traffic jams.  If "undertaking" is to be made punishable (fines & penalty points) then so should "hogging" the middle and outside lanes needlessly - there should be equal treatment for all wrong doers
